text: Comaclinium is a genus in the sunflower family, described as a genus in 1852.Scheidweiler, Michael Joseph François & Planchon, Jules Émile. 1852. Flore des Serres et des Jardins de l'Europe 8: 19-20. description in Latin, commentary in FrenchScheidweiler, Michael Joseph François & Planchon, Jules Émile. 1852. Flore des Serres et des Jardins de l'Europe 8: plate 756. color illustrationTropicos, Comaclinium Scheidw. & Planch. There is only one known species, Comaclinium montanum, native to Central America and to the State of Chiapas in southern Mexico. ==References== Category:Tageteae Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Chiapas Category:Flora of Central America Category:Monotypic Asterales genera
title: Comaclinium
